name: Redemption of the Damned
description:
Simulator of a hunt for evil spirits in the setting of 17th century European occultism with the combination of the structure and principles of Diablo I and combat mechanics of the Resident Evil 7-8 series.

The main character by itself is a deadmen who dreams of the repose of his soul and for this aim he fights against monsters in the system of dungeons of the cursed church, built according to the principles of metroidvania.

The main goal of the game is to get through the dungeons of this church to an abandoned castle to meet with its owner to get the possibility to rest in peace.
